name: Monstercare (marsac, HellbergDev)
description:
Keep your monsters happy and enjoy your stay on the island!

A life simulator where you care for adorable monsters in first-person. You interact with monster to keep them happy by feeding them etc.

End of term 1 project at Valla Game Education.

Game design
HellbergDev & marsac

Animation
HellbergDev & marsac

3D art lead
HellbergDev

Programming lead
marsac

Sound lead
HellbergDev

UI lead
marsac
